entities.text: Cabling infrastructure that uses light signals for data transmission
Traditional cabling infrastructure using electrical signals
Electromagnetic radiation emitted by electronic devices

relationships.from: Fibre-optic cables do not produce, nor are influenced by, electromagnetic emanations
relationships.to: Fibre-optic cables offer the highest degree of protection from electromagnetic emanation effects

relationships.from: Fibre-optic cables are used for cabling infrastructure instead of copper cables
relationships.to: Fibre-optic cables replace copper cables for cabling infrastructure

relationships.from: Fibre-optic cables do not produce, nor are influenced by, electromagnetic emanations
relationships.to: Electromagnetic emanations can affect copper cables but not fibre-optic cables
